doc.after: Although vos is not used in Spain it occurs in many Spanish speaking regions of the Americas as the primary spoken form of the second person singular familiar pronoun although with wide differences in social consideration Generally it can be said that there are zones of exclusive use of tuteo in the following areas almost all of Mexico the West Indies Panama most of Peru and Venezuela coastal Ecuador and the Caribbean coast of Colombia
